groups.page_description: At the University of Washington, there a limited amount of groups and organizations that are serving the asylee and refugee communities. You can make a difference by starting a short-term service group with your peers and volunteer!

groups.instructions: Click on 'View More' to find out the details of the event and who is already signed up! If you have inspiration for your own event, create a group! If you are looking for inspiration, see our Orgs page to learn about what Seattle organizations are seeking assistance with in their efforts.
